Description: CES (Consumer Electronics Show) is the world's largest tech expo, showcasing cutting-edge innovations and gadgets from the electronics industry.
Web Summit is a premier global tech conference uniting industry leaders and innovators to explore the future of technology and its impact on society.
E3 is the ultimate showcase of the gaming industry, featuring the latest video games, hardware, and major announcements from leading game developers and publishers.
A game show is a competitive and entertaining television program where contestants participate in various challenges, puzzles, and quizzes to win prizes or cash.
Facebook Hackathon is an exciting coding event where developers come together to create innovative projects and solutions using Facebook technologies.
CodeDay is a coding and programming event where young enthusiasts gather for intensive coding sessions, workshops, and creative tech projects.
